灄字的基本解释

灄
shè
见“滠”。

灄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shè］
［《廣韻》書涉切，入葉，書。］
“滠1”的繁体字。
(1)筏子。
(2)水名。古滠水。故道在湖北省孝感市汉川县之间，今已湮。
(3)水名。今滠水。有二源：一出湖北省红安县，一出河南省罗山县，至黄陂县合而南流，纳诸湖水，入长江。

灄字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灄； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页662第17
【廣韻】書涉切【集韻】失涉切，?音攝。水名。【水經】江水，左爲湖口。水通太湖，又東合灄口。　又【集韻】日涉切，音聶。義同。　又昵立切，音孴。澀灄，雨露貌。　又【春秋·繁露山川頌】小者可以爲舟輿浮灄。【註】灄，浮栰之類。

Tiao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shè]
["Guangyun" book involves cutting, entering leaves, book. ]
Traditional characters for "滠1".
(1) Raft.
(2) Water name. Gutui water. The old road was between Hanchuan County, Xiaogan City, Hubei Province.
(3) Water name. This is Tushui. There are two sources: one out of Hong'an County in Hubei Province, the other out of Luoshan County in Henan Province, to Huangpi County, and the river flows south, taking the lake water into the Yangtze River.
Tiao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Character Department】　滠; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 662 Page 17
[Guang Yun] Book She-cut [Ji Yun] Loss She-cut,? Audio. Water name. [Water Channel] River water, the left is the mouth of the lake. The water flows through Taihu Lake, and it is in the east to meet Yankou.　[Jiyun] Rishe cut, sound Nie. The same meaning.　Nicely cut again, Yin Wo. Astringent, rainy appearance.　[Spring and Autumn·Song of Fanlu Mountains and Rivers] The little ones can float for the boat. [Note] 滠, floating 栰 and the like.
